xmlText.p: First Period_1, Pittsburgh, Simon 3 (Cole, Crosby), 3:54. 2, Pittsburgh, Malkin 22 (Kessel, Crosby), 9:09 (pp). Penalties_Zucker, MIN, (tripping), 8:37; Hagelin, PIT, (hooking), 15:12.

Third Period_5, Pittsburgh, Malkin 23 (Kessel, Schultz), 1:42 (pp). 6, Pittsburgh, Simon 4, 2:32. 7, Minnesota, Staal 20 (Foligno, Prosser), 8:44. 8, Minnesota, Granlund 15 (Zucker, Suter), 10:50 (pp). 9, Minnesota, Brodin 5 (Foligno, Staal), 11:46.
